channel.title: BMS Shiny heads
channel.description: So if found BMS to be really laggy! So i tried an fps config to make it run faster,it worked! The problem is that it causes the characters to be shiny, reflective, or whatever it is on some parts of their body, it depends on the angle they're facing and whatever. So my question is: What part of the fps config is causing this to happen? I've linked a screenshot ![2012-09-16_00010.jpg|690x500](upload://zBlIVX838WOjuhlCKc3z3pyPBZq.jpeg)

item.title: BMS Shiny heads
item.dc:creator: tommy255
item.description:
So if found BMS to be really laggy! So i tried an fps config to make it run faster,it worked! The problem is that it causes the characters to be shiny, reflective, or whatever it is on some parts of their body, it depends on the angle they’re facing and whatever. So my question is: What part of the fps config is causing this to happen? I’ve linked a screenshot

2012-09-16_00010.jpg1023×767 77.2 KB
